title: Mystery Skin Gift?
body:
Greetings.

So i just got some RP (so original)

and I thought I'd go ahead and gift a mystery skin for one of my friend.
and... it's not there. I can't find it. I tried going over other people on my friendlist to see if they appear there or not. And they don't

where is the Mystery Skin Gift? did I miss some information about it? or is my client bugged?
am i missing something here?

replies.body: Yeah, I saw another post about this in the morning and have forwarded the report to interested parties.  I don't have any updates to provide right now, but can confirm it's disabled.  Hopefully it will be back in no time!

ALSO i forgot to mention that the mystery champion, Mystery Icon, buying a skin (not the mystery one) and the others are all available.

only the mystery skin gift isn't there.
